item.title: Troubleshooting 3ds Max Export Triangulating Mesh Problem
item.description: How to troubleshoot 3ds Max export triangulating your mesh When exporting your mesh as fbx in 3ds Max, the mesh becomes triangulated. You can check them in whatever tools you import the mesh, including 3ds Max itself.
